name: Dahan: Raakan Ka Rahasya
info: IAS officer Avani Raut arrives in Shilaspura, a town riddled with superstitions. As she tries to bring progress there, she battles the demons of her past.

name: Criminal Justice: Adhura Sach
info: Teenage superstar Zara Ahuja mysteriously goes missing after she gets into an altercation with her brother Mukul, who despises her existence.

name: Special Ops
info: When a set of R&AW officials are asked to create an audit report of Himmat Singh miscellaneous expenses, a nineteen-year-old theory finally sees a glimmer of light.

name: OK Computer
info: When a self-driving car kills a pedestrian, prickly Cyber Cell detective Saajan Kundu teams up with his estranged partner Laxmi Suri to investigate. But was this an accident?

name: Live Telecast
info: Retelling real-life paranormal stories is what Jenny and her team does best, and their show, Dark Tales, is proof of that. But the otherworldly may be closer than they think.

name: Kanpuriye
info: Jaitun, Jugnu and Vijay's dreams are hanging by a thread. While they struggle to prove their mettle, life keeps taking them for a spin.

name: The Office
info: Jagdeep Chaddha claims to be the Chief Fun Officer, but his team thinks differently about his sense of humour. To address the elephant in the room, a workshop on racial tolerance and diversity is organised.

name: Hundred
info: Netra’s dull life as a government employee gets rocked by unsettling news. On the other hand, ACP Saumya is desperate to break the glass ceiling. What happens when the two cross paths?

name: Hostages
info: A night before the operation of the Chief Minister of Haryana, Dr. Mira Anand, his surgeon is held hostage along with her family by four masked men. Suitable for viewers 15+

name: Bahut Hua Sammaan
info: Perpetually failing engineering students Bony and Fundoo get talked into robbing a bank by the campus loon. What follows is something neither anticipated.

name: Moon Knight
info: As Moon Knight joins the fray, Marc, Steven, and Khonshu must work together to stop Ammit.

name: Ms. Marvel
info: Kamala Khan attends Avengercon only to discover that she herself might have superpowers.

name: Marvel's The Avengers
info: Nick Fury finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster by launching the Avengers initiative.

name: Guardians Of The Galaxy
info: A stranded jet pilot in space must unite a diverse team of aliens to form a squad capable of defeating cosmic threats.

name: Black Panther
info: T'Challa, heir to the hidden kingdom of Wakanda, must lead his people into a new future and confront a challenger from his country's past.

name: Werewolf By Night
info: On a dark and somber night, monster hunters gather to pay respects to their deceased leader and are thrust into a deadly game.

name: Thor: Love and Thunder
info: The God of Thunder teams up with King Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend-turned-Mighty-Thor Jane Foster to take on a galactic killer known as Gorr the God Butcher.

name: She-Hulk: Attorney at Law
info: Jen Walters’s world is turned upside down after a freak accident leaves her with superpowers.

name: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
info: When the Multiverse is unlocked, Doctor Strange must enlist help from old and new allies in order to confront a surprising adversary.

name: Eternals
info: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history, and civilizations

name: Willow
info: Tir Asleen receives an important delegation from Galladoorn, but a sudden attack by the mysterious Gales prompts Queen Sorsha to seek help from an old friend.

name: Mickey: The Story of a Mouse
info: A look at Mickey's evolution into different versions that reflect his creator and society's changes.

name: Zootopia+
info: Head back to the mammal metropolis to dive deeper into the lives of a slew of intriguing residents.

name: Pinocchio
info: A live action retelling of the beloved tale of a wooden puppet who embarks on a thrilling adventure to become a real boy.

name: Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers
info: When an old friend goes missing, Chip and Dale must return to their crime-fighting roots.

name: Limitless with Chris Hemsworth
info: Before attempting the ultimate stress test, Chris learns how to tame his unruly stress response by training with soldiers and firefighters.

name: Star Wars: Tales Of The Jedi
info: A child goes through a rite of passage with unexpected results.

name: Super/Natural
info: Welcome to the weird and wonderful world where animals and plants use secret powers to form unexpected alliances, allowing them to survive and thrive.

name: Growing Up
info: Alex's story dives into her experience dealing with depression in her middle and high school years.

name: The Zone: Survival Mission
info: The first simulation starts in a dreary space. Hang in there, and do not stand out!

name: Brahmāstra Part One: Shiva
info: A journey of fantasy, action and romance comes to life as Shiva enters the Astraverse! He discovers true love and also, the power of fire within him.

name: Freddy
info: Introverted and awkward Dr Freddy Ginwala desperately searches for a soulmate. When he finally finds her, the relationship becomes as painful as a root canal.

name: Sita Ramam
info: On a letter-delivering task, Afreen learns of a 20-year-old romance set amidst a war. Her quest to trace the lovers makes her embrace humanity beyond borders.

name: Liger - Saala Crossbreed
info: A brave-hearted Liger works his way up to find his dream spot in the MMA world. But, his life gets complicated when he crosses paths with Taniya.

name: Drishyam
info: Story of a common family man who takes desperate measures to save his wife and two daughters when they unwittingly get entangled into a crime.

name: Cuttputlli
info: When a small town gets plunged into the nightmare of serial killings, rookie cop Arjan embarks on a chase for the truth and unravels a gruesome conspiracy.

name: Shiddat
info: Love-struck Jaggi can cross the seven seas for his dream girl, Kartika. Even if it means stopping her wedding.

name: Chhichhore
info: Divided by time, united by a tragic incident. In a bittersweet reunion, seven middle-aged friends take a walk down the memory lane at the least expected place.
Chronicling the historic 1983 Cricket World Cup, thirteen underdogs led by Kapil Dev fight and win against all odds to put India on the map.

name: Total Dhamaal
info: When 50 million bucks are at stake, six eccentric people will do whatever it takes, including braving the wild. Who will win this race against time?

name: Doraemon
info: Suneo shows off his new robot and uses Nobita to test its punching and kicking powers. With Doraemon's help, a vengeful Nobita builds a Giant Robot that flies through the air and easily defeats Suneo's robot.

name: The Jungle Book
info: When a tiger named Shere Khan threatens to kill Mowgli, a young boy raised by wolves, his friends Bagheera and Baloo help him escape his clutches.

name: Frozen II
info: Why was Elsa born with magical powers? Together with Anna, Kristoff, Olaf, and Sven, she sets out on a dangerous but remarkable journey to find the answer.

name: The Good Dinosaur
info: Arlo, an Apatosaurus makes friends with a human friend and learns how to deal with his fears and what he is capable of.

name: Selfie with Bajrangi
info: With his new special pen, Ranga plans a wicked move against Ankush.

name: Shin-chan
info: Shin-chan ponders over the thought of his future profession. The gang faces tough competition in the swimming competition.

name: Cars
info: A hotshot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

name: Marvel's Ultimate Spider-Man
info: One year after becoming Spider-Man, teenager Peter Parker is approached to train with S.H.I.E.L.D.

name: Doraemon
info: Suneo shows off his new robot and uses Nobita to test its punching and kicking powers. With Doraemon's help, a vengeful Nobita builds a Giant Robot that flies through the air and easily defeats Suneo's robot.

name: Luca
info: The movie is a coming-of-age story about one young boy experiencing an unforgettable summer filled with gelato, pasta and endless scooter rides.
